segment1: The video shows several scenes of the movie "Lawman" directed by John Woo and featuring Jean-Paul Belmondo and Hsiao Chao. The main characters are a gang of illegal immigrants who live in a basement. The video contains shots of the gang members being processed by a group of officers, standing in line, and walking around the office building where they work.The video also includes a segment where a man with a beard and a police officer are talking to each other in a jail cell. Later, the gang members are seen in a jail cell with another officer standing in front of them. One of the gang members is seen trying to steal a watch from the other gang member in the cell.The video also includes several shots of a mine shaft and workers inside it, as well as shots of a group of men dressed in uniforms. One scene shows two officers standing outside a building, while another shows a man standing on the street talking to a group of uniformed police officers.Throughout the video, the camera captures the mood and actions of the characters as they navigate the different environments they are in. The scenes are set in the middle of the night, making the lighting and shadows more prominent. Overall, the video provides a glimpse into the world of gangsters and their interactions with the police during the time of the Chinese Civil War.
